title: F/S: T206 Cobb Bat Off --- A Sharp PSA 1.5
author: christopher.herman

posts.post_title: F/S: T206 Cobb Bat Off --- A Sharp PSA 1.5
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I purchased this T206 Cobb Bat Off Sweet Caporal 350 Subjects  Factory No.30 24 Dist. N.Y. PSA 1.5 a few months back from a fellow Net54er and now I'm ready to upgrade.
NO LONGER AVAILABLE
This card has great eye appeal despite the top/bottom border issue and significant paper loss on the back. There is also a speck of paper loss on his chest. No wrinkles or creases.
PM's get priority in order received.
Thanks for looking,
Christopher

P.S. I really am looking to upgrade --- so if anyone has this card in better condition (Sweet Cap back only) I would be willing to offer this card with a cash kicker.
-C.

[URL="http://tinypic.com?ref=2rr5r9z"][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2rr5r9z.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Sharp card for the grade, Chris.  Best of luck with your sale!

Andy
Thanks, Andy. It is a sweet card at a reasonable price, I think.
